channel.title: Ted Talks on Marta Kołczyńska
channel.description: Recent content in Ted Talks on Marta Kołczyńska

item.title: First steps in text analysis: Applause and laughter in TED talks
item.description: This year I spent two weeks of the summer attending the Summer Institute for Computational Social Science Parter Site (SICSS) in Tvärminne and Helsinki, Finland. The program covered various topics that combine computational and data skills and social science topics. One of the methods discussed was text analysis. Text analysis I downloaded and unzipped the plots.zip file from the link on the GitHub repository. We then read the files into R, and combined them using dplyr.
